question:
An old friend of yours is coming to visit your city. You had planned to meet him at the airport, but something has come up and you will not be able to make it there on time.
Write to your friend, In your letter
Explain the situation
Offer to make alterntive arrangements.


Write at least 150 words.
text: It's been so long since we've met and finally it's time to see you at my place. I'm very excited to see you in Ontario after such a long period however I'm afraid, I won't make it to the airport to pick you up and I'm extremely sorry about that.

First of all, I am pleased to inform you that I've been promoted to senior manager post last week and as a result, I need to be at my work for one important meeting with one international client. I know you will understand not only my situation but also the significance of my new job.

In spite of the meeting, I have prepared one plan for you. I can book a cab for you from the arrival point to my home which I think will be much more comfortable as cab facilities in my town are very reliable. Furthermore, We can have dinner together at Lord's restaurant at night with our old friends in the town.
Please drop me a line if you're all right with this arrangement. Looking forward to seeing you soon mate!
